definition: "cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]

sentences.english: It's only when we wake up that we realize how things are actually strange.
sentences.chinese: 只要到醒來的時分纔會認識到事情不短冖兒。

definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]
to walk (side part of split character)

step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
"walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]
name of "cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14)/see also 冖[mi4]

component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 毫[hao2]/archaic variant of 乙[yi3]
"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
